00007 //*******************************************************************************
00008 Real dg::LogGamma(Real fX)
00009 {
00010         const Real afCoeff[6] =
00011                 {
00012                         + (Real)76.18009173,
00013                         -(Real)86.50532033,
00014                         + (Real)24.01409822,
00015                         -(Real)1.231739516,
00016                         + (Real)0.120858003e-02,
00017                         -(Real)0.536382000e-05
00018                 };
00019 
00020         fX -= (Real)1.0;
00021         Real fTmp = fX + (Real)5.5;
00022         fTmp -= (fX + ((Real)0.5)) * Log(fTmp);
00023         Real fSeries = (Real)1.0;
00024         for (int j = 0; j <= 5; j++)
00025         {
00026                 fX += (Real)1.0;
00027                 fSeries += afCoeff[j] / fX;
00028         }
00029         return -fTmp + dg::Log(((Real)2.50662827465)*fSeries);
00030 }

00032 //*******************************************************************************
00033 Real dg::Erfc(Real fX)
00034 {
00035         const Real afCoeff[10] =
00036                 {
00037                         -(Real)1.26551223,
00038                         + (Real)1.00002368,
00039                         + (Real)0.37409196,
00040                         + (Real)0.09678418,
00041                         -(Real)0.18628806,
00042                         + (Real)0.27886807,
00043                         -(Real)1.13520398,
00044                         + (Real)1.48851587,
00045                         -(Real)0.82215223,
00046                         + (Real)0.17087277
00047                 };
00048 
00049         Real fZ = Abs(fX);
00050         Real fT = ((Real)1.0) / ((Real)1.0 + ((Real)0.5) * fZ);
00051         Real fSum = afCoeff[9];
00052 
00053         for (int i = 9; i >= 0; i--)
00054                 fSum = fT * fSum + afCoeff[i];
00055 
00056         Real fResult = fT * Exp( -fZ * fZ + fSum);
00057 
00058         return ( fX >= (Real)0.0 ? fResult : (Real)2.0 - fResult );
00059 }
00060 //*******************************************************************************
00061 Real dg::CubicSpan(Real fX, const Real afC[4], const Real afM[4][4])
00062 {
00063         Real fC3 = afM[0][0] * afC[0] + afM[0][1] * afC[1]
00064                          + afM[0][2] * afC[2] + afM[0][3] * afC[3];
00065 
00066         Real fC2 = afM[1][0] * afC[0] + afM[1][1] * afC[1]
00067                          + afM[1][2] * afC[2] + afM[1][3] * afC[3];
00068 
00069         Real fC1 = afM[2][0] * afC[0] + afM[2][1] * afC[1]
00070                          + afM[2][2] * afC[2] + afM[2][3] * afC[3];
00071 
00072         Real fC0 = afM[3][0] * afC[0] + afM[3][1] * afC[1]
00073                          + afM[3][2] * afC[2] + afM[3][3] * afC[3];
00074 
00075         return ( ( fC3 * fX + fC2 ) * fX + fC1 ) * fX + fC0;
00076 }
00077 //*******************************************************************************
00078 Real dg::BicubicSpan(Real fU, Real fV, Real afC[4][4])
00079 {
00080         return (
00081 
00082         fU * (fU * (fU * (fV * (fV * (fV * afC[0][0] + afC[0][1]) + afC[0][2]) + afC[0][3])
00083                                    + (fV * (fV * (fV * afC[1][0] + afC[1][1]) + afC[1][2]) + afC[1][3]))
00084                                    + (fV * (fV * (fV * afC[2][0] + afC[2][1]) + afC[2][2]) + afC[2][3]))
00085                                    + (fV * (fV * (fV * afC[3][0] + afC[3][1]) + afC[3][2]) + afC[3][3])
00086         );
00087 }
00088 //*******************************************************************************
00089 void dg::MakeBicubicMatrix(
00090         Real afG[4][4],
00091         Real afM[4][4],
00092         Real afC[4][4])
00093 {
00094         /* temporary */
00095         Real afT[4][4];
00096 
00097         /* T = G * M^(t) (T gets G times transpose of M)*/
00098         for (UInt i = 0 ; i < 4 ; i++)
00099         for (UInt j = 0 ; j < 4 ; j++)
00100         for (UInt k = 0 ; k < 4 ; k++)
00101         afT[i][j] += afG[i][k] * afM[j][k];
00102 
00103         /* C = M * T (C gets M times T)*/
00104         for (UInt i = 0 ; i < 4 ; i++)
00105         for (UInt j = 0 ; j < 4 ; j++)
00106         for (UInt k = 0 ; k < 4 ; k++)
00107         afC[i][j] += afM[i][k] * afT[k][j];
00108 }
